title: Journal of Health and Social Behavior - Pharmaceutical Side Effects and Mental Health Paradoxes among Racial-Ethnic Minorities
description: Author Jason Schnittker discusses his article, co-authored with Duy Do, "Pharmaceutical Side Effects and Mental Health Paradoxes among Racial-Ethic Minorities," published in the March 2020 issue of Journal of Health and Social Behavior.
